name: Block Snake (JiukOn)
description:
- Commands -  

W or ↑ - to move up.  

S or ↓ - to move down.  

A or ← - to move left.  

D or → - to move right.

- Objective - 

Take as many red squares (Food) as you can, this will define your score. 

To be declared game over, you must hit the snake's head on another part of its body. 

After finishing the game, tell us in the comments what your score was!
